title: Simulation-Based Communication Competency Development Program for Electrical Engineering Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Basic electrical engineering theories and understanding of major-related terminology
context.additional_context: Provides job-specific communication training environments using VR simulations, supporting self-directed learning through personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can create a 5-minute presentation applying a clear structured logic (problem-cause-solution) to a given technical problem in a VR-based simulation.
Learners can generate and discuss three or more critical questions (clarity, validity, feasibility) about peersâ€™ technical presentations.
Learners can complete a technical solution negotiation process in collaboration with team members in a simulation environment with over 80% participation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
